t: Amazon’s electric delivery vehicles from Rivian roll out across the U.S.
s: July 21, 2022 - Amazon and Rivian plan to bring thousands of custom electric delivery vehicles to more than 100 cities by the end of this year, and 100,000 by 2030.

t: Amazon now has over 13,500 custom electric vans delivering to customers across the U.S.
s: November 27, 2024 - In addition to ordering 100,000 custom electric delivery vehicles from Rivian, Amazon has put more than 15 models of electric vehicles on the road, including delivery vehicles, e-cargo bikes, and e-rickshaws, to test and learn across the U.S., the European Union, and India.

t: 11 Cool Features of Rivian's Amazon Electric Delivery Van
s: February 27, 2024 - We got up close and personal with the van, and believe us, you'd love for your Black Friday and Cyber Monday purchases to roll up in this cute Rivian EDV.

t: Meet Amazon’s electric vehicles making deliveries around the world
s: March 12, 2025 - Our roster of zero-tailpipe emission vehicles helps us deliver packages to customers around the world.

t: Amazon is testing Rivian electric delivery vans in Los Angeles
s: August 27, 2021 - Amazon agreed to buy 100,000 Rivian electric vehicles as part of its pledge to achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2040.

t: Go behind the scenes as Amazon develops a new electric vehicle
s: Amazon ordered 100,000 electric delivery vehicles—the largest-ever order of electric delivery vehicles—from Rivian, a producer of emissions-free electric vehicles with a vehicle development center in Plymouth, just outside Detroit.

t: Amazon places its largest-ever order of electric heavy trucks
s: February 6, 2025 - The zero-exhaust emission vehicles, from Mercedes-Benz Trucks, are expected to transport more than 350 million packages every year.

t: Rivian - Electric Adventure Vehicles
s: Discover Rivian's long-range electric vehicles, designed for adventure. Explore our innovative EV cars and join the movement towards a sustainable future.

t: Bezos-backed Slate Auto unveils affordable EV truck
s: April 25, 2025 - Slate Auto, a firm backed in part by Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, is unveiling a low-cost electric truck that can also change into an SUV.

t: How the job of Amazon delivery has changed with Rivian's electric vans and routing software
s: January 18, 2023 - Now that Rivian vans are delivering in 100 U.S. cities, Amazon drivers say a lot has changed with their experience on the roads.

t: Amazon’s custom electric delivery vehicles are starting to hit the road
s: There’s a new vehicle delivering smiles to customers, and it’s electric.

t: Amazon unveils its new electric delivery vans built by Rivian | The Verge
s: October 8, 2020 - Amazon unveiled the electric delivery van that is being built by Michigan-based EV startup Rivian. The delivery giant aims to have 10,000 vehicles on the road by 2022 and 100,000 by 2030.
